name: BURG Installer For Ubuntu 13.10
short_description:
This comes from code from Launchpad's Bean.
https://code.launchpad.net/~bean123ch/burg/
All code belongs to him. I just created an install script so you can get Burg for Ubuntu 13.10.

USE THIS TOOL AT YOUR OWN RISK. The downloaded binaries were designed for Ubuntu Maverick Meercat. However, they work on 13.10 without dependency conflicts. Just make sure you have a way to reinstall GRUB if something goes wrong. But I don't think something will go wrong.

!!! THIS PROGRAM IS IN BETA !!!
There may be bugs! Tell me and I will fix ASAP.

This works for 32-bit and 64-bit. Sadly, I could only test this on my 64-bit box. If you have any problems, shoot me an email at fslezak (at) zerobit (dot) in
summary: BURG (Brand-new Universal loadeR from Grub) Installer Script
